website_summaries.verdict: One of the better budget models that won't leave you wanting more.
pros: Comes with different attachments such as a concentrator nozzle and diffuser to stylize the hair while drying
Control settings are within easy reach on the handle
cons: Not delicate enough for some thicker hair styles

customer_reviews.title: failure
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working out of the blue in less than two months. I rarely leave reviews--something like this never happens with my purchases. This is really disappointing and I don't know what to do. It was used less than three times a week just to dry wet scalp. I did not drop it or anything, plugged it only when in use. I can't believe this has such great reviews (although I did enjoy using it until it stopped working). Did I get a faulty product? How do I reconcile?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cuts hair drying time in half
customer_reviews.text: I have had this hairdryer for years with no problems. I have CRAZY THICK hair that takes forever to dry. Not with this baby!!! It has a SUPER STRONG air power and the cool mode is ACTUALLY cold air!! I swear it cuts the amount of time it takes to dry with my old hair dryer in half. I am so passionate about this amazing hair dryer that i've bought it for my mom and sister. Everyone needs this hairdryer. For the price you will not get a better hairdryer. To be honest, you could spend 10X the price and this would still be the better buy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S.

customer_reviews.title: Very decent blow dryer, quality may decline over time?
customer_reviews.text: We owned this model that we bought several years ago but this same model has gotten much better (or the other one declined in performance over time, I'm not really sure). Either way, this one gets your hair dry quickly without causing a lot of heat damage. I was looking for the cheapest/best model out there, as long as it had 3 heat settings and 2 speeds, and this one works great. However, I don't really have any experience to compare it to, I am sure there are much better models out on the market, but if you don't have hundreds to spend on one, this one feels very decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burned up after 10-12 uses.
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this about 10-12 times, sadly it has burned up already. What really sucks is I bought another one right away because I liked the way this one worked, hope it works longer. I have short hair that takes less than 2 minutes to blow dry.
customer_reviews.author: froogy

customer_reviews.title: Don't order you won't get a refund if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and got a bad one. It made a loud squeaky sound when I turned it on. I got OK from Amazon to send it back for a refund. I sent this back over a week ago and never got my refund. Its horrible that Amazon does not have a customer service department that is available by the phone any more! Usually I get my refund within hours.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: no low setting
customer_reviews.text: The air settings are too high and too hot. You cant style your hair on a low and cool setting. Too overpowering
customer_reviews.author: FlaShebs

customer_reviews.title: so good..
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good...I've had it 2 months & it does the job of the $100 dryer it replaced. A nice thoughtful detail is the rubber stops on the side of the dryer keeps it where you put it. I had a very expensive dryer commit suicide by vibrating off the counter onto a tile floor. The switches are awkwardly placed on the handle...easy to do an accidental toggle flip..you'll have to adjust how you normally hold a dryer.Cord could be longer. Good diffuser & concentrator tips...easy on & off. It's lightweight & of good quality. 4 stars instead of 5 because it's noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: It really looked like it had been used for 20 years before someone ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a very used hair dryer. The handle part had paint peeling off from over use and there was a thick layer of dust and hair stuck in the funnel. Smelled heavily of salon and perfume. It really looked like it had been used for 20 years before someone decided to resale it on Amazon. I can't believe it. Can not believe. I tried to upload a photo but was blocked so I'm resubmitting my review without a photo
customer_reviews.author: delfina

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: Ok, do... my old dryer works just fine. But. I saw on Amazon that there were dryers that let you do high speed low temp and vice versa - whereas my old one has hot and high. So, as part of my project to update my hair syling appliances with low temps for my fine hair, I bought this one. It feels nice in my hand, looks great, controls are easy to adjust while using it, and the results look great. I am glad that I replaced my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Innovation Creator

customer_reviews.title: Guaranteed frizzy hair!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give 0 stars, I would. This dryer is heavy and leaves my hair super Friday compared to my $15 dryer that is on its last leg. Doesn't dry any faster either. This is now taking up space in my cabinet and I only use it when one of my kids has my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Nevie

customer_reviews.title: Burned out after few months
customer_reviews.text: When I started using the dryer it worked very well. Wasnt blowing too strong (as noted in some comments) and dried my hair fast ( I have long hair). Unfortunately after 4 months of using it, one day I could smell a very strong burning smell. First I checked if the filter is not messy, which was clean after I took the tip-off and thought I solved the issue. Used it twice and after smell came out again. I can't use it anymore as the burning smell is too strong and don't want it to cause a more serious issue. Shame, as I was really happy with it....Therefore comments with dried burning out are true.
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Great Salon Quality 💃🏽💃🏽
customer_reviews.text: The color shade is Awesome and it works great. Keep in mind that the drying brush attachment is the diameter of a Mellon. Yes its really large!! and you have to hold the dryer at the mouth when drying your hair. It does a great job and I love the multi temperature options. The metallic orange color is a nice plus. The power of the air flow on high, med, or low will dry any thickness of hair. I enjoy the cool setting to balance off the heat. The dry quality is top notch and it has the look of a high priced salon dryer. I really believe I will get years of use out of this Awesome dryer.
customer_reviews.author: theresa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer for a really great price!
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Super powerful and light weight. I had my last conair dryer for fifteen years and was really sad when it stopped working. I chose this dryer because of the price and great reviews! And I am not disappointed. The dryer is quite powerful. My hair is wavey and as a result I have frizzy hair if I use a blow dryer that is not powerful enough or too hot. This dryer allowed me to dry my hair straight and have my hair look like I just walked out of the salon. I would definitely recomment it to family and friends. The sports car orange is the icing on the cake!!

customer_reviews.title: Strong force but good dryer
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned this dryer for years. I give it 4 stars just because of the sheer force of the air; sometimes it’s too much. Seriously if you like a low setting then this isn’t the dryer for you. You could swap it out with your leaf blower. Nevertheless, it dries hair quickly and I like the multiple heat settings. My last one lasted me for over 3 years. Hoping this one does the same
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Easy Fail Filter Mechanism
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 2 of these, every sing one had its filter mechanism fail. The plastic is just too fragile and it starts fail locking into the dryer after cleaning. Now it just falls right off, and wont hold in place. The consequence is that the lint will now flow through the dryer causing a burning smell. After a while, it now has a electrical burning smell. We really would like to continue using this dryer but we are not buying this for the 3rd time.. fool me once shame on you, fool me twice....well I already been fooled so no way Jose!
customer_reviews.author: blueocean0

customer_reviews.title: One loud and strong wind blowing hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I had a con air, just died and it was perfect. This one looks great but it is so loud and blows my hair with so much force that it leaves it looking totally wind blown. Which if you have fine hair looks terrible. I feel like it dries like those old hair dryers that hotels used to have hanging on the walls and because of that I would pack my own hair dryer. Ugh can't believe I have to go in search of a hair dryer that is not going to blow my hair off my scalp.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Dries fast!
customer_reviews.text: This came with several styling tools like a diffuser and an angled nozzle to style with a brush. The thing works so well! The diffuser and the nozzle both fit well on the dryer and the dryer has low-medium-high settings and hot-warm-cool settings with a cold burst button to set a style. My hair is thick and takes the hairdresser more than half an hour to dry enough to let me leave the salon. This at home leaves me damp dry enough to go to work in about the same time, which says a lot to me about the product. My curling iron is also Conair.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Light weight!! Love
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months and I have to say I really like it. I was looking at $200 hair dryers because I color and highlight my hair a lot. This was recommended by stylists who use $200 dryers as a great product. Decided to try it and it works really great. It feels great in my hand and the cord doesn't tangle. Don't be dusauded by the cheap price. This thing is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: LcharapichTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Best hairdryer ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these that after many years, quit working. I ordered this to replace it. My daughter was visiting and used my hairdryer and fell in love with it too. She ordered one for herself, and one for her friend. They were both amazed at how quickly this dried their long hair. My hair is short, and it takes 1-2 minutes to dry.
customer_reviews.author: barbara carroll

customer_reviews.title: Not a safe product.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this dryer for one month. I’ve only used it maybe 10 times. Today when I turned it on sparks flew out of it and now it only blows out cold on all temperature settings. This is clearly not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Negus

customer_reviews.title: Things sure have changed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Conair 1875 Watt Salon Performance AC Motor Styling Tool/Hair Dryer because I have always used Conair and I wanted to buy an American product. I was hoping since it had been a few years (my old one was still working but not great) that features would have improved. Instead the new dryer is heavier, a lot louder and does not get as hot as the last one so it takes a lot longer to dry my hair (medium length and density). I even spent a little more than I normally would in hopes of getting a super product. Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Quinn

customer_reviews.title: REALLY, AMAZON??? UNDELIVERABLE??? GET IT TOGETHER!
customer_reviews.text: The dryer is fine. I have one and I would rate it 4 stars. Great dryer for the price. The ONE star ratings are actually for AMAZON. I ordered this item last week to avoid being without a dryer only to get a message from Amazon telling me that for some ridiculous reason, my order was "UNDELIVERABLE"??? With their apologies, of course, and promise to refund credit card. I will be watching for that refund, Amazon. I just placed an order for the exact same dryer. Let's see if I receive it THIS time. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Short cord, cheap price, mediocre drying product
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed after reading such good reviews. The power of this dryer wasn’t strong enough but after researching USA hairdryers, none seemed to have more power. The power cord is also way too short. I had to sit down to use it in the bedroom with a socket at normal floor level. I’ve since moved it to using in the bathroom with the socket at face level and it’s much better. The promises of reduced frizz etc didn’t hold true for me either. My hair is fine, long, prone to frizz if humid etc and this didn’t dry it as well as I’d expected. It was a very good price though.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna

customer_reviews.title: Not hot enough and Loud!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this, based on the reviews, to replace a Conair Cord-Keeper dryer I have had for several years but stopped working (probably because I dropped it). I loved my old dryer -- it was hot enough, didn't blow insanely hard, but still got my fine-but-plenty hair dry very quickly. AND it had a retractable cord!! This dryer, however, is loud (at its highest setting) and just doesn't feel "hot." In fact, it feels like warm air surrounded by medium-temp air. Weird. I will be returning it in favor of getting another Conair Cord-Keeper.
customer_reviews.author: fashionplate

customer_reviews.title: It's good, but...
customer_reviews.text: Good. A bit heavy, which we expected. Worked great, good blow speed, good heat. This week the unit made a popping sound while using it and a crack appeared on the casing. This is after Amazon's return period. I called Conair to see what they could do. They will send us a new one, but only after receiving the old unit and we have to pay shipping. The price has dropped such that it costs just about as much for us to buy a new unit as it would to pay for shipping, pay the return shipping, and be without a hair dryer for about 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Em Rabelais

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, but quality has gone down.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the same hair drier a number of years ago, which I was very very happy with, when I accidentally dropped it, I ordered the same product, this one is much lighter, and cheaper feeling. It often puts off a burning smell when on high power. It does what it needs to do but the quality has gone down in a major way. Pretty disappointed in this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOO LOUD!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely the LOUDEST hair dryer I have ever used. I feel like I’m going deaf and I already have tinnitus. To even use it on the lowest setting, I have to wear earplugs because my ears ring worse. I’m pissed I wasted money on this contraption 😡
customer_reviews.author: Savannah S.

customer_reviews.title: High-powered
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a high-powered lightweight hair dryer, this is it. I am only giving it 4 stars because it was too high-powered for me. I have fine hair and the dryer dried my hair so quickly that I couldn't really style it properly. I need a lower speed (low on this hair dryer isn't very low) to style my hair type effectively. It is very lightweight and easy to pack for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I have had this blow dryer for about 2 weeks. All the settings work great including the cool shot. I paired it with the Black Orchid Diffuser I also bought off amazon. (the diffuser fit the blow dryer, you must remove the inner ring of the blowdryer in order to fit)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, great volume, smooth finish.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this blow dryer. The technology it has with ion finish is super. My hair is so smooth and full of volume when done blow drying. Great power to dry quickly. Bonus for me is the cool button feature. Use it to cool scalp when get hot Absolutely love this hair dryer and highly recommend. Like that it has pieces as attachments for hair type as well.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and hot, it's everything I dream a hair blower to be.
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! Not gonna lie, it was a bad review that sold me on this blower dryer. Yes, it is loud. Yes, the air can get really hot. And yes, it has a powerful blower that will dry your hair very quickly. My hair is curly/wavy and fine. I like to blow dry my hair straight, and when I use other dryers not like this one, my hair becomes frizzy. Again, this dryer blows my hair dry and straight very quickly; so, it doesn't become frizzy. As for the loudness, might I suggest ear plugs. :)
customer_reviews.author: Zeldagal84

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the last model.
customer_reviews.text: this hair dryer sucks. This is the updated version of the last one I had which worked great and dried my hair in 10-15 minutes. With this it takes me at least 20 to dry. I dislike it. It has no power or heat. Wish I had gotten a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Shelton_50

customer_reviews.title: Too Cool for me
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the hurricane effect and it doesn’t get hot. From the reviews I see I’m not the only one who feels this way. I have the advantage of comparing it to my 8 year old dryer (that’s making some strange noises) and it definitely has a problem getting hot. It doesn’t get hot enough to dry my (short) hair. I don’t need wind, I need heat. And it’s way too heavy. I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this drier to anyone
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer dries hair a ton faster than the cheaper alternatives. I would recommend this drier to anyone. My wife had the previous version of this same dryer and it was still working like a champ after almost 8 years. I'm also fairly certain she dropped it every day and who knows what other tortures it was put through. This is a good unit.
customer_reviews.author: Tim G.

customer_reviews.title: really dislike the placement of the buttons
customer_reviews.text: Loud, rattles & isn’t anything special. You get what you pay for, I guess. I “cheaped out” & shouldn’t have. Also, really dislike the placement of the buttons!?! This particular unit was NOT on the recall list! Definitely would not buy again! It does, however, dry my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Logan

customer_reviews.title: Go ahead and buy this. Just hope it doesn't break.
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after just a few months. Contacted Conair twice and was promised an RMA to return for replacement which never happened. Seemed irritated I was calling in the first place. Amazon was to follow up with me to confirm this replacement was taken care of. Never heard back from them either. Extremely poor buying experience all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Casady

customer_reviews.title: No slow speed on fan
customer_reviews.text: I had an earlier version of this dryer for 7 years but it finally died. That one had 2 heat settings and 3 fan settings. But *this* one has 3 heat settings and 2 fan settings and the fan's low speed is like a force-1 hurricane. (The high setting is a force-3 hurricane.) Even the low speed is way too much to do styling by drying the hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: djd

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and powerful!
customer_reviews.text: Admittedly, I bought this mostly for its pretty copper color. When it arrived, it’s just as I expected it to look, but I’ve also been blown away by how quickly it dries my hair. (Very long, thin hair, but lots of it) It’s so much more powerful than my previous dryer, and I like that, even on the hot setting, it doesn’t get super hot like my previous dryer, either. It’s also very light, and should be easy to pack. Very glad I got this!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Took awhile to get used to
customer_reviews.text: I have naturally very curly long hair. It took me a little bit to get used to this dryer. I was either frizzed out or looking like a damp towel was on my head. I usually do not have this issue (say with hotel hair dryers; they all seem to leave me with the look I want). After about 2 weeks though, I figured it out. It was a decent price and now that I get the look I want I am ok with it.
customer_reviews.author: whippindayams

customer_reviews.title: Not outstanding, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer was highly rated in many surveys, and while I don't have any major complaints, I don't really see why this one stood out from any other standard hairdryer. I was looking for a hairdryer that didn't blow my long, fine hair all over while using it. It blows pretty hard, so I have to use the diffuser - which is a bit large and awkward. Another minor issue is the buttons don't seem intuitive and are easily pressed while in the middle of using the machine, resulting in accidentally turning it off, or too hot, or too high, etc... So, it's just okay...
customer_reviews.author: jenjigirl

customer_reviews.title: Diffuser IS included April 2020
customer_reviews.text: Five stars (so far) factoring in the price and inclusion of the diffuser. This was delivered last night. Other than a test for temperature and velocity variations (which seem fine) I haven't used this hair dryer on my hair yet but based on the test it seems this will function as advertised. If not I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Nice but heavy when you fly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for flying with hopes it would be lighter than my Paul Mitchell dryer and diffuser. It’s smaller but not much lighter. It dried well but the diffuser, as expected, is not as nice as my PM diffuser. It’s a nice dryer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast air flow - for better or worse
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised not more of these reviews mention how INTENSE this air flow is, even on low. It whips my hair around so fast and it’s pretty tough to round brush when the air flow is so fast. It’s fairly heavy but it does dry very fast. I’m torn on this one since the allow setting is like SUPER MAX on my other store bought dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L Barett

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working and started on fire....
customer_reviews.text: I am not one who needs a fancy blow dryer, so I bought this one as it had great reviews. I had it for maybe a little over the year, but I only blow-dry my hair 2 times a week so not everyday. This morning I went to use it and it was going in and out for about 10-15 seconds and then it started sparking. It was very scary. I will probably never purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Huisman

customer_reviews.title: Great... for the price.
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever used an expensive hair dryer, you will know the difference. This blow dryer though really effective, does not dry quite as fast as my previous high end hair dryer. Also, this is slightly heavier and takes a bit to get used to. That said, it is by far, the best low cost hair dryer I have ever used. If you are not in the market to spend over $100, you really should give this one a try!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a basic good quality hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is exactly as promised. It is exactly what I paid for, a $30ish hair dryer. If you want it to do fancy things, you need to pay a fancy price. You get what you pay for. I wanted a basic good quality hair dryer. That's what I got in this one. It dries my hair rather quickly but not too quickly that I can't style as I go along. I have short hair with no special qualities about it. This dryer does everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Coco2034

customer_reviews.title: Drys thick hair in half the time!
customer_reviews.text: I had my last blow dryer for over ten years so finding a good replacement was important to me. This blow dryer has not disappointed! I have very thick hair and it dryers it in half the time of my old blow dryer. It is light weights and fits fine in drawer and suitcase. Only complaint is that it is a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Girl Living in Georgia

customer_reviews.title: The drying power needs to improve, that's all
customer_reviews.text: I bought this dryer for a friend, the only thing that she doesn't like is the drying power.In other words the heat is not high or hot enough to dry her hair as fast as she would like.Other than that there is nothing wrong.Just by looking at it, I think it is well made and In my opinion it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wilme Peguero

customer_reviews.title: Conair 1875 Blow Drier
customer_reviews.text: This blow drier is the same as my previous drier that lasted 6 or 7 years. The only difference is it does not have the self rewind cord feature. I Liked that function until it became difficult to rewind. So far this blower is exacyly what I wanted. Light weight and easy to handle function buttons.
customer_reviews.author: j robertson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one like this quite a few years ago, we like this model so well, I order a new one and took our old to use at our cabin. It has a lot of blowing power, and great heat ranges. This is one of the best hair dryers out there, build well and lasts a long time, I would suggest this unit to any one that wants a great hair dryer that is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Gummy

customer_reviews.title: I love the Conair brand for hairdryers
customer_reviews.text: I love the Conair brand for hairdryers. I have tried other brands and they just do not compare to the quality of this brand. I think this is one of the best hair dryers that I have had in a long time. It has a quieter sound than my last Conair. It seems to be more powerful and did dry my hair quickly, leaving it very soft and manageable. I did not think the cord was too short, it was about the same length that I am used to having. I highly recommend this hair dryer. Buy it! Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt Salon.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer puts out a lot of air, so it really doesn't take very long to get my hair dry. There's a couple of power setting and a couple of temperature settings which is all I really need. It could be a better color but I knew what color it was before I bought it. It comes with a few attachments, but I doubt I will use them simply because I just want to get her done! It was packaged well and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: CJARDH

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have asked for a better hair dryer. I got it ok Amazon Warehouse for around $15 and it dries my hair in seconds. I'm a guy with a man bun, so not as long as some other people, but I doubt that it would take long. Even on the cold setting, to protect my hair, it dries super quickly. I love this dryer
customer_reviews.author: Shlomo S

customer_reviews.title: Love this dryer
customer_reviews.text: For some reason I have a hard time choosing a hair dryer. I settled on this based on other reviews and chose this particular color because it was on a great sale. Love it. Would maybe like to have one more speed setting but it’s not a big deal for me. Definitely saw improvement on how my hair looked after using. Just as good or better than the last dryer I had that I spent double the money on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best blow dryer for years
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blow dryer for 10 years. I recently purchased a second one for my guest bathroom. It has been through 4 years of college, several moves, and many suitcases. I cannot say enough about this hair dryer. I have recommended it to friends and they have loved it too. Funny enough, I recommended it to two guys. Both said they thought blow drying hair would take longer, since girls tend to complain about the length of time it takes, and this blow dryer was so easy that they wished they would have thought to get one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fastest dryer I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: Wow I love this blow dryer. It’s the fastest dryer I’ve ever used and for the most part hasn’t cause a lot of damage from what I can tell. This has reduced my drying time by 50% and I struggle when traveling without it. Would recommend to anyone looking for a powerful hairdryer that will make your routine faster.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn

customer_reviews.title: Requested gift means someone likes it a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I already had this hair dryer for over a year. My daughter uses it when she visits, and the last visit she told me how much she likes it. She said it dries her hair quickly and better than her current dryer. It was a no brainer to get this as a gift for her. She was excited when she opened the gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair quickly - easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I really like the power on this hairdryer. It does a fast job on my hair. The controls are located in a good spot and I can manage all the buttons easily with the hand holding the dryer (this is really important to me) I have had several Conair dryers in the past and they last longer than other dryers.
customer_reviews.author: Francie

customer_reviews.title: Just do it!
customer_reviews.text: Holy smokes! This thing will blow you into next year! I've been searching for one that blows harder than my Conair. It is a little heavy and the buttons aren't in the best spot but I'll get over it real fast considering it cuts dry time in half! The hot also gets super hot! Don't listen to the negative reviews! Get this! You won't be upset!

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Blow Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great blow dryer that works well and has all the needed bells and whistles. Granted a Dyson looks cooler but costs about 10x what this one does. It's not light but it seems to be well built. I'm very happy including with the color that works great in my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: BMan

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: great product for the price although I find the high blower setting is a bit too strong. Also a bit heavy and my arm gets fatigued quickly. Gets the job done though. I find the medium blower setting works best to keep my hair from getting frizzy. I have straight, thick fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa

customer_reviews.title: Great Blow Dryer for A Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm African American with very thick wavy hair, and this blow dryer did a great job blow drying my hair. Had to switch from high to medium due to the fact that it gets hot, and I mean very hot. I used to concentrator and a round brush to blow dry my hair my arms got tired fast since it is heavy. Haven't used the diffuser yet...I'll update when I do. If you're AA and looking for a good blow dryer for a good price this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Myisha Timmons

customer_reviews.title: One the best blow dryers according to many sources online
customer_reviews.text: Love it. This is one of the top blow dryers according to my research before buying it. Also it was like a $6.00 diffrence in the orange one and the blue or purple one. So of course I saved the money and got the orange one. It's still super pretty even though I don't care for orange.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fast drying!  Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my trailer and Love it! Fast drying. We went on a trip it worked great when we got home I was drying my hair with my other hair dryer and literally put my old dryer in the garbage and bought another for the trailer again. Because it works great! I will tell you it is loud. That does both bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Casey & Desiree Strong

customer_reviews.title: The best blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I used to own a $180 blow dryer, then one day I used my friends' (this model) and immediately fell in love. I couldn't believe it was so much less expensive than mine, because it dried my hair in half the time and was more comfortable to use. I bought this dryer, donated my old one, and have never looked back. I LOVE this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: When my old Conair died after 10 years, of course I needed a new Conair!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer is even better than my old one, with more heat and air settings. I have very thick hair and this dryer does a beautiful job of getting my hair dry in minutes, and then I use a round brush at a lower heat setting (with shots of the "cool" button) to style. Very, very, pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CPV

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and lasts.
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one, but only because we had to have one at grandmas. The other one has been used every single day for 10 minutes or so for the last 4 years without a hiccup. It also doubles as a spill dryer when you screw up and spill all over your couch. Handles high heat for a long time. I haven't had it temp out and turn off to cool like they used to when I was young.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this blow dryer this style has been my go to since 2013. I love it! I have had about 2 of them since then due to dropping them and breaking and they last so long and are so affordable! The drying power is very strong and the hot setting gets hot!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: Love this dryer! I have been looking at getting a good dryer with diffuser for my curly hair. I have wrestled with the thought of getting a Dyson brand but that price tag is RIDICULOUS. I saw another curly girl say she got the Infinitipro and loved it so I decided to give it a try. So glad I did. Dries my hair faster than my old dryer and frizz seems to be to a minimum. I have only used it 3 times so far but am definitely glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: bwesson

customer_reviews.title: No box, button is faulty but it works
customer_reviews.text: The product is good. But it was only in its original box, no outer box protection like the amazon brown box. The box has dents on it. And it seems like the button to increase temperature to high is faulty.
customer_reviews.author: tmsd22

customer_reviews.title: I love this hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer has awesome power. It is relatively light for it's size, but it is not compact. You could probably travel with it, but it will take up some room. It does offer different settings for heat/cool. So far I am very happy with this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Dries my hair fine. Very loud when using.
customer_reviews.text: Usually use the lowest power in a medium/low heat settings. Im not sure what it advertises as but it is very loud. Scared thre crap out of me thre day i received it and tried it out. Maybe i got a faulty one. Maybe it's just super loud. Im unsure. I know i have never bought one being this scary before..unless it was about to die on me.
customer_reviews.author: Amber W

customer_reviews.title: great inexpensive blow drier
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I was a guest at my sisters over Christmas and had to get on line to order myself one. I thought it would be around $75.00 because it worked so well. What a surprise! So inexpensive! Highly recommend. I bought the orange cuz it was much less than the other colors and who gives a hoot about colors! Extremely happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: LINDA DEYARMOND

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hairdryer for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just got a new hairdryer for the first time in 6-7 years (gasp). Both my sisters own this make and HIGHLY recommend it. Now I do too! Top features: multiple heat and intensity levels that actually differ. Even on the "highest" setting for heat and power, I don't feel like the dryer is burning my hair. It's not super light weight or small for traveling, but I use it only at home.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful1690

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with this hair dryer. I have thick shoulder length natural curly hair and it usually takes a long time to dry. I can, however, using heat diffuser, dry it in about 7-10 minutes with this dryer. Also, I can use highest heat setting when I want to straighten my hair with round brush and a little smoothing oil. Very pleased with performance of this product st this price point.
customer_reviews.author: LBP

customer_reviews.title: Just another dryer
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a fast drying dryer (cannot and will not spend 300 for a dyson) and I was sold on the review below that said this was comparable to dyson. I don't think so... It takes about the same time to dry my hair as my almost 10 year old conair dryer. It is prettier, quite heavy, not quiet at all, it is nice that it has 3 diff temp option
customer_reviews.author: soki

customer_reviews.title: just love it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this dryer very much. The color orange is different nice. It is smaller and lighter then what I thought. What I did not like is that whoever delivered it , it was brought to me without any packing box only the box it came in. I am lucky I was at home anyone could have taken it. I check when I know something is coming in the mail I wanted to bring this to Amazons attention if they did not know about it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D.

customer_reviews.title: Dries my hair fast
customer_reviews.text: I had another Conair for many years, and this is its replacement. On the highest setting, it is powerful. I usually use the lower setting, and my hair dries quickly. No frizz. Styles great. For me, it’s another dependable Conair hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer0314

customer_reviews.title: Great power
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted a new hairdryer so that I could help dry myself after the shower. A dermatologist recommended using a hair dryer on a cool setting to avoid chafing. This dryer is really working well. Many settings, and good cool strong air.
customer_reviews.author: sharonsays

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Would purchase again, a little heavy.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the hairdryer! It does what it’s supposed to and I really like the color. It feels quite heavy though. Admittedly I don’t walk around using a lot of random hairdryers but it seems quite heavy. I know my hair is going to be dry when I’m done using it but I also know that my arms are going to hurt. Still totally worth the purchase and really only a minor negative. it’s fairly compact and you could certainly travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: JLM

customer_reviews.title: Does not dry my hair
customer_reviews.text: I could not get this to dry my hair. The heat levels would not stay consistent. I checked the filter to see if that was the issue. It was clear. I tried different heat settings. No change. Ugh. And all the beauty magazines rated this highly. I 'll be buying a new hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: High speed.. Luke warm hot setting
customer_reviews.text: I'm still kind of on the fence with this dryer... The hot heat setting seems to only be warm. The high speed setting however is so strong it sometimes makes little knots in my hair. With that said, my hair does seem smooth and it dries quickly. Maybe I'm just used to a dryer that is scolding hot?? Overall it seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: aLauraBorealis

customer_reviews.title: Conair never lets me down
customer_reviews.text: Before I picked up this Conair Infinitipro, I was using a random Conair hair dryer. I used that hair dryer everyday for the past few years and it never broke on me! I decided to pick the Infinitipro up because I accidentally cut the wire on my old Conair hair dryer. It doesn't take much to please me when it comes to hair dryers. As long as it has standard hot/warm/cool and high/low settings on them, I'm set. It seems to operate relatively quieter than my old Conair hair dryer and the attachments are definitely a big plus. Once again, Conair doesn't let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Ugur

customer_reviews.title: It's wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I really like this new Hair Dryer and the attachments. My hair is short and it dries it pretty quickly no matter what. But there were some complaints that it wasn't hot enough, but it feels pretty dam hot to me and the cold shot button works pretty well. I think the people complaining about it want some kind of blow torch. But I don't know, I'm no expert in these things, I just know that it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Yan

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My last CONAIR hair dryer last for more than10 years and every time I used other hair dryer from hotel or my friends I can tell the difference. The Conair one won't dry out my hair and dry it faster than others.
customer_reviews.author: Ariannahou

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I have super thick hair. Very powerful dryer. The 3rd "high" setting is too much. I get knots if I use high speed. I use high heat and medium speed and it does great!
customer_reviews.author: JT1223

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a year and a half
customer_reviews.text: Loved this dryer but I have only had it a year and a half and it stopped working this morning. My last conair dryer lasted me almost 10 years. I don't use it every day either. Sad this one didn't work longer.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality for a Bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: This my second Conair Infiniti Pro. My first one lasted about five years. I don't think I could do better for the price. It has the features I want, three speeds, and three heat levels on seperate buttons. It is small enough to take traveling although it does not have a folding handle. I find the weight is just fine even for an elderly person. The orange color is fine for me because the dryer is stored inside a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, wish wish the cord was longer.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a very high-end dryer that died on me after 15 years of use. It works well with a strong blast of air and has a "cool" setting which is nice. Would have given it 5 stars if the cord was longer because I keep pulling the plug out of the outlet when I try to dry the left side of my hair (the bathroom outlet is on the wall to the right of the mirror). If your electrical outlet is VERY close to where you will use this dryer, it is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TLJack

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I've been purchasing bargain blow dryers for years and went through one about every two or three years. I decided to try a higher quality product this time around and couldn't be happier! Not only is the heat lower, and less damaging to my hair, but the actual dry time is shorter overall. This comes with a sufficient number of settings and accessories and fits really well in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: LD Crowe

customer_reviews.title: Good Hairdryer with Lots of Settings & Accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great hairdryer, although even the low setting is pretty powerful. I needed to replace my old Conair InfinitiPro (lasted over 10 yrs) & also wanted a diffuser. I've been using this for over a month & it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Dries hair SO fast!!!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed this dryer from my aunt while visiting over a weekend and loved it. Purchased one for myself and I'm obsessed!!! Dries so quick, and although it's a bit louder than my previous dryer- I get excited to do my hair because it doesn't take me forever anymore. Doesn't get too hot, so doesn't fry my hair which is awesome. Cold setting actually gets COLD, too. Buy it. You'll be glad you did.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fraire

customer_reviews.title: Durability for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep in the camper so I would not have to keep taking it back and forth. This is the second one I have bought. I have had the first one for three years and have never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but....
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a perfectly fine blow dryer. A bit noisy, but aren't they all? HOWEVER, if you have straight, fine hair like I do, do NOT bother getting an ionic hair dryer. ALL it does for my type of hair, is make it flatter and even more lifeless. Found out that all I need is a cheapo regular old blow dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great dryer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like this hair dryer, the hottest setting isn’t frying my hair. It is light weight, and I appreciate the price. I was tired of spending a ton on a dryer. My last HD cost $80 and burned my hair. Very happy with this purchase. Would recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Heavy.
customer_reviews.text: This blow dryer had great reviews so I decided to give it a try. I have tried multiple to compare it against. It is very loud and heavy. After blow drying 3 girls hair it is very cumbersome to use. It did not leave my hair very soft or shiny. There was nothing special about this blow dryer. It wasn’t even good enough for me to throw in my gym bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a replacement hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: I had my prior hair dryer for 12 years and for the past 5 or so, it sounded like it was dying every time I used it. I snagged this new one on Prime Day for a good price and I was so happy I did. It runs so much more efficiently and quietly than my old hair dryer. I can dry my hair much more quickly, but without all the noise or rattling.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this blow dryer!
customer_reviews.text: An Airbnb where I recently stayed listed a blow dryer as an amenity. I’m pretty picky about these things, but decided to risk it and not pack mine. I was trying to not check a bag! I was pleasantly surprised when this was the dryer. It’s powerful and the nozzle really concentrates the air. I liked it so much that I purchased one when I got home!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Heath

customer_reviews.title: Solid and dependable
customer_reviews.text: I had the same one years ago that my mom stole, and it still works great, so I bought another one! It’s a little heavier than others, but it’s got power for sure. Definitely always has been my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love the low setting and 3 temp settings
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blow dryer for over a year - great value for the price. It works great, especially for those with fine hair. For those with fine or thin hair a blow dryer with a low or medium setting is def needed for styling. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: lynette p.

product_meta.title: INFINITIPRO BY CONAIR 1875 Watt Salon Performance AC Motor Styling Tool/Hair Dryer; Orange
product_meta.description:
Color:OrangeGet professional results at home with the Infiniti Pro by Conair AC motor/salon performance styling tool. The AC motor delivers a powerful airflow for fast drying and a longer life. It features ceramic technology that safely dries and promotes healthy looking hair and ionic technology for less frizz. The included true cold shot button locks in curls, waves and styles. Rocker switches toggle 3 heat and 2 speed settings for heat and airflow control. It includes a removable filter that prevents damaging lint build-up and extends motor life. It includes 2 concentrator attachments. Hanging ring for easy storage.

BRAND STORY
By Conair
feature_bullets: Dry your hair like a pro with the Infiniti Pro by Conair 1875 Watt Salon Performance AC Motor Hair Dryer. With a professional AC Motor, dry your hair 50% faster with up to 3X longer dryer life
Ionic technology for smooth, shiny-looking hair and up to 75% less frizz - and - Ceramic Technology provides uniform heat for fast drying and less damage
3 Heat / 2 speed settings for custom heat and air flow
True Cold Shot Button locks in curls, waves, and style
Includes: Diffuser for textured styles - and - Concentrator for smooth styles ; 6-foot line power cord

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
